text: Yukihiko Sato (born 11 May 1976) is a Japanese football player. He plays for V-Varen Nagasaki. In 2009, there was a story in the newspapers saying that Australia's Newcastle United Jets were interested in getting the midfielder to play for them. ==Club career statistics== |- |1995||rowspan="3"|Shimizu S-Pulse||rowspan="3"|J.
